item.title: Hugo 01 | Documentation
item.description: Introduction to Hugo Templating Hugo 使用Go语言的 html/template and text/template 库作为模板. Content Organization Hugo认为相同的结构体用来组织源内容，同样用来渲染站点。 Hugo’s Lookup Order Hugo searches for the layout to use for a given page in a well defined

item.title: 概率论
item.description: 原文连接 1.2 概率论回顾 概率，又称或然率、机会率、机率（几率）或可能性，是概率论的基本概念。概率是对随机事件发生的可能性的度量，一般以一个在0到

item.title: LeetCode 刷题笔记
item.description: CONTENT MANAGEMENT 1. Two Sum Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. Example: Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target = 9, Because nums[0] + nums[1] = 2 + 7 = 9, return [0, 1]. 思

item.title: Page Resources
item.description: CONTENT MANAGEMENT Page Resources ResourceType The main type of the resource. For example, a file of MIME type image/jpg has for ResourceType image. Name Default value is the filename (relative to the owning page). Can be set in front matter. Title Default blank. Can be set in front matter. Permalink The absolute URL to the resource. Resources of type page will have no value. RelPermalink The relative URL to the

item.title: Math Sample
item.description:
KaTeX can be used to generate complex math formulas server-side.

$$ \phi = \frac{(1+\sqrt{5})}{2} = 1.6180339887\cdots $$

Additional details can be found on GitHub or on the Wiki.
